subject: Re: [R] deleting collumns with colSums==0
body:
A <- A[, colSums(A) != 0]

(untested)

> Precedence: list

> Dear all,
> 
> I have some matrices which colSums are equal to zero and I would like to delete all them.
> How can I do that?
